issue.title: BidirectionalIterator concept should provide default implementation for post-decrement

discussion.p: A default implementation should be supplied for the post-decrement operator to simplify implementation of iterators by users.
Copy the Effects clause into the concept description as the default implementation. Assumes a default value for postincrement_result.

blockquote.p: This issue cannot currently be resolved as suggested, because that would render auto-detection of the return type postdecrement_result invalid, see .
